name: Odyssey Tactics
description:
Adventure awaits! Four daring adventurers have teamed up to find fame and fortune! Guide them to victory by utilizing their unique skills to overcome immense obstacles. Defeat opponents using positioning and battlefield control! 

 Welcome to our super-duper early gameplay demo of Odyssey Tactics, within this build is our first compilation of combat mechanics, consider everything within this build completely not final. It is considered to be Pre-Alpha and we hope you all can enjoy the game and submit your feedback!

Please enjoy Odyssey Tactics!
